plot: On the planet Earthdash, its inhabitants gaze on its moon and the technologically advanced lunar city of Mooneyes with awe. Dan JD, a boy living in Rollingtown on Earthdash’s surface, gets caught up in Bigfoot Basketball—a fast-paced sport played with giant Bigfoot robots.
opening_theme: "nO limiT" by Eclipse [Haruka Tomatsu, Megumi Nakajima & Saori Hayami] (eps 2-6, 8-10)
"Boku ga Boku no Mama" (僕が僕のまま; "Me Being Myself") by THE SPIN (eps 14-26)
ending_theme: "Running On" by Eclipse [Haruka Tomatsu, Megumi Nakajima & Saori Hayami] (ep 13)
"Futari no Yakusoku" (二人の約束; "The Promise Made Between the Two of Us") by Eclipse [Haruka Tomatsu, Megumi Nakajima & Saori Hayami] (eps 14-23, 25-26)
